mapper.sql: id, job_name, job_type, job_priority, creator_id, owner_ids, alert_users, alert_types, schedule_cron, is_selfDependent, job_cycle, max_retrytimes, retry_interval, execution_timeout, worker_groupName, job_ReleaseState, description, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select * from t_thales_scheduler_job job left join t_thales_scheduler_job_relation job_relation on job.id = job_relation.job_id where job.job_ReleaseState != -1
and job.job_type = #{jobType}
and job.job_name like concat(concat('%',#{jobName}),'%')
ORDER BY job.create_time DESC
